text: [Music]
Amazon and Intel have been collaborating
on new technology for over a decade
together we've been able to Pioneer new
ec2 instance families which provide
dramatically more bang for buck more
computational power at lower cost which
lets customers do more for Less the new
C5 instance family which we announced in
November last year is powered by a
custom Intel xon scalable processor with
a new microarchitecture new hardware
acceleration capabilities and support
for Intel's AVX 512 instruction set the
Intel xon scalable processor combined
with the Innovations in networking and
acceleration in the C5 instance family
bring about a major Epoch in the world
of high performance Computing machine
learning and artificial intelligence
it's never been easier and more cost-
effective to collect data at any scale
store it in a broad set of databas and
storage services and then build custom
machine and deep learning models today
businesses deploy more machine learning
workloads on AWS than any other platform
including Aon a large insurance and
capital advisory company who is running
Financial simulations using machine
learning on AWS which reduce the time to
complete simulations from days to
minutes and the computational power of
the Intel Zeon scalable processor lets
customers use more data to create
Innovative new products and experiences
powered by Machine learning together
with Intel we've optimized deep learning
engines with the latest version of the
Intel math kernel library and the Intel
Zeon scalable processors available on
the new C5 instance family to increase
inference performance by over 100x we've
also worked closely with Intel to
demonstrate how you can use familiar
tools such as Apache spark and bigdl to
easily build distributed deep learning
applications on AWS high performance
Computing allows engineers and
scientists to solve complex compute and
data intensive problems HPC apps often
require High Network performance fast
storage large amounts of memory and very
high compute capabilities making them an
ideal workload for our compute optimized
instances including the new C5 running
these workloads on AWS gives customers
instant access to thousands or tens of
thousands of ec2 instances running Intel
zon processes allowing them to increase
the speed of research in a
cost-effective way that would not be
practical in most on- premises HPC
environments for example novatis used
10,600 ec2 instances and approximately
87,000 compute cores to conduct 39 years
of computational chemistry in just 9
hours screening 10 million compounds
against a cancer Target this magnitude
of improvement is changing what is
possible in Industries such as
Healthcare Life Sciences Financial
Services scientific research Aerospace
Automotive manufacturing and energy
we're super excited to see our
collaboration with Intel continue and
for customers to continue to innovate on
AWS through the best performance aail
ailable anywhere
[Music]
